prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow fur and powerful arms.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a muscular humanoid with lightning motifs.
Generate a bold, bipedal creature boasting bright yellow and black stripes.
Make a Pokemon inspired by electrical energy, featuring unique arm appendages.
Imagine a creature that excels in urban environments, radiating electric power.
Design a Pokemon known for its strength and agility in battles.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of electricity and speed.
